Class TextUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • TextUtil

  • public class TextUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles text alignment for the AlignText program
    Author:
    Inthuch Therdchanakul 27/9/2017

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TextUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void alignCenter(java.lang.String[] paragraphs, int lineLength)
      This method center-align text from the file.
      static void alignLeftRight(java.lang.String[] paragraphs, int lineLength, java.lang.String format)
      This method left/right align text from the file
      static void alignText(java.lang.String[] paragraphs, int lineLength, java.lang.String option)
      This method calls appropriate text alignment method based on user input
      static void justifyText(java.lang.String[] paragraphs, int lineLength)
      This method fully justify text from the file.

        public TextUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • alignText

        public static void alignText(java.lang.String[] paragraphs,
                             int lineLength,
                             java.lang.String option)
        This method calls appropriate text alignment method based on user input
        Parameters:
        paragraphs - The paragraphs from text file
        lineLength - The line length specified by the user
        option - align mode which is an optional command line argument. It will be empty if the user did not specify one.

      • alignLeftRight

        public static void alignLeftRight(java.lang.String[] paragraphs,
                                  int lineLength,
                                  java.lang.String format)
        This method left/right align text from the file
        Parameters:
        paragraphs - The paragraphs from text file
        lineLength - The line length specified by the user
        format - The format of text alignment. It can be left/right align

      • alignCenter

        public static void alignCenter(java.lang.String[] paragraphs,
                               int lineLength)
        This method center-align text from the file. It will add an extra space to the start of the line if there are an odd number of spaces.
        Parameters:
        paragraphs - The paragraphs from text file
        lineLength - The line length specified by the user

      • justifyText

        public static void justifyText(java.lang.String[] paragraphs,
                               int lineLength)
        This method fully justify text from the file.
        Parameters:
        paragraphs - The paragraphs from text file
        lineLength - The line length specified by the user
